snippet.title: four monts out of treatment and still feel bad
snippet.description: ... or there any five year survial people out there that had invasive lobular brest cancer. ... tumor 2.5 with one node that had a little cancer in it. they took out 10 lump nodes. ... Now i have fluid in my chest and a little in my arem. Shoulders hurts and back.My legs ... have pain in them. My hole body has pain in it at times. When I get up I be stiff. ... Is this the way it make you feel. ...

snippet.title: Hi my wife barbara has been diabetic for about 8 years now, and her prescribed medication has gradually increased, in the last 12 - 18 mont
snippet.description: ... month she was rushed into hospital with symptoms akin to Lactic Acidosis, hospital not confirmed this but have reduced her metformin to 3 per day, she has been released and tests are still ongoing, she is still suffering from shortness of breath and severe exaustion, should her metformin be reduced further? ...

snippet.title: I have 2 different chemo regimens between which to choose: dose dense AC every 2 weeks for 4 cycles, followed by T (4 cycles) VS. TAC every 3 weeks for 6 cycles. How do i decide which is better?

snippet.title: I had my tubes tied almost 6 years ago and have had regular cycles. I finished my last cycle less than 2 weeks ago and startedanother cycle today. I was told it could mean a tubal pregnancy, True??
i not having my period about 1years & 2mths. my last cycle was 10 march 2010. i was not doing sex nearly 1 months. my aunty had a same prob when she was young but her cycle back normal after married
snippet.description: ... january until june - no period at all.. ... June until december - normal period... 7 days n every months until december.. ... but suddenly, years 2010, im having my period from june 2009 until march 2010... then im not having period back until now... ... wen i stop taking the medication, suddenly the blood also stop. ...

snippet.title: Effectiveness of 4 cycles of TC vs 6 cycles of TC (Taxotere + Cyclophosphamide)
snippet.description: ... The profile is as follows: ... Tumor size : 0.7cm ... ER/PR : Positive ... HER 2 : Negative ... Grade : 2 ... Age : 41 ... ... Would like to know if chemo regimen of TC x 4 cycles or TC x 6 cycles is effective for this profile? Please advise. Thank you. ... ...

snippet.title: which is better? Taxol or Taxotere and why? 3 weekly cycle of Taxotere or weekly cycle of Taxol?
snippet.description: ... ... Her doctor said, go for Taxol weekly dose but another doctor having the same qualifications says, she can go for 3 weekly Taxotere dose. Both medicines have the same results. So, we are confused!!! ... ... Any help??? ...

snippet.title: if you neutropenic after one of the cycles of adriamycin & cytoxan for breast ca do the dr.'s reduce the lifetime dose or increase it for the next cycle?
I have a 25-26 day cycle and my husband and I are trying for our second child, I was wondering if implantation occurs earlier in shorter cycles?
can i only have four cycles of fac chemotherapy instead of 6 cycles?
